channel.title: Compiler error
channel.description:
Okay so I was working in NPCHandler.java and I saved and compiled and I got this error message. [code] NPCHandler.java:1100: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^[/code]
And I can't figure out how to fix it. Please help me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 08:23:09 pm[/size][hr]Please I really need help
